This bibliography does not aim to be exhaustive, but purports to include the most significant items of the voluminous literature. For further bibliographical information see Barnes 7 and Salem 15. Two comprehensive bibliographies of Presocratic philosophy have recently appeared
The Presocratic Philosophers: An Annotated Bibliography
The latter volume covers items up to 1989; a continuation of the former is in progress
